Package com.flag4j.core

Interface ComplexMatrixMixin<T,​Y>

Type Parameters:
T - Matrix type.
Y - Real matrix type.
All Superinterfaces:
ComplexTensorMixin<T,​Y>, MatrixOperationsMixin<T,​CMatrix,​SparseCMatrix,​T,​Y,​CNumber>, MatrixPropertiesMixin<T,​CMatrix,​SparseCMatrix,​T,​Y,​CNumber>, TensorOperationsMixin<T,​CMatrix,​SparseCMatrix,​T,​Y,​CNumber>, TensorPropertiesMixin<T,​CMatrix,​SparseCMatrix,​T,​Y,​CNumber>
interface ComplexMatrixMixin<T,​Y> extends ComplexTensorMixin<T,​Y>, MatrixPropertiesMixin<T,​CMatrix,​SparseCMatrix,​T,​Y,​CNumber>, MatrixOperationsMixin<T,​CMatrix,​SparseCMatrix,​T,​Y,​CNumber>
This interface specifies methods which any complex matrix should implement.

  • Method Details

    • conj

      T conj()
      Computes the complex conjugate of a tensor.
      Returns:
      The complex conjugate of this tensor.

    • conjT

      T conjT()
      Computes the complex conjugate transpose of a tensor. Same as hermTranspose() and hermTranspose().
      Returns:
      The complex conjugate transpose of this tensor.

    • hermTranspose

      T hermTranspose()
      Computes the complex conjugate transpose (Hermitian transpose) of a tensor. Same as conjT() and H().
      Returns:
      he complex conjugate transpose (Hermitian transpose) of this tensor.

    • H

      T H()
      Computes the complex conjugate transpose (Hermitian transpose) of a tensor. Same as conjT() and hermTranspose().
      Returns:
      he complex conjugate transpose (Hermitian transpose) of this tensor.

    • isHermitian

      boolean isHermitian()
      Checks if a matrix is Hermitian. That is, if the matrix is equal to its conjugate transpose.
      Returns:
      True if this matrix is Hermitian. Otherwise, returns false.

    • isAntiHermitian

      boolean isAntiHermitian()
      Checks if a matrix is anti-Hermitian. That is, if the matrix is equal to the negative of its conjugate transpose.
      Returns:
      True if this matrix is anti-symmetric. Otherwise, returns false.

    • isUnitary

      boolean isUnitary()
      Checks if this matrix is unitary. That is, if the inverse of this matrix is equal to its conjugate transpose.
      Returns:
      True if this matrix it is unitary. Otherwise, returns false.
